verses.name: Genesis 31:5
verses.text: And said unto them, I see your father’s countenance, that it is not toward me as before; but the God of my father hath been with me.

verses.name: Genesis 31:6
verses.text: And ye know that with all my power I have served your father.

verses.name: Genesis 31:7
verses.text: And your father hath deceived me, and changed my wages ten times; but God suffered him not to hurt me.

verses.name: Genesis 31:8
verses.text: If he said thus, The speckled shall be thy wages; then all the cattle bare speckled: and if he said thus, The ringstraked shall be thy hire; then bare all the cattle ringstraked.
